components.name: Navbar
Section Button
components.description: A button whose color is determined by the background color of its parent component (passed in via `parentColor` prop).

components.name: Section

children.name: Header

components.name: Auth

children.attributes:
{
  value: email,
  type: 'email',
  placeholder: 'Email',
	error: showErrors && getError('email'),
  onChange: (value) => setEmail(value)
}

{
  value: pass,
  type: 'password',
  placeholder: 'Password',
	error: showErrors && getError('pass'),
  onChange: (value) => setPass(value)
}

{
  value: confirmPass,
  type: 'password',
  placeholder: 'Confirm Password',
	error: showErrors && getError('confirmPass'),
  onChange: (value) => setConfirmPass(value)
}

{
	parentColor: props.parentColor,
  size: "medium",
  fullWidth: true,
  state: props.status && 
    			props.status.type === "pending" ?
						'loading' : 'normal'
}

components.name: Sign In Section
Sign In

children.attributes:
{
  mode: 'signin',
  buttonText: props.buttonText,
  parentColor: props.parentColor,
  onSubmit: onSubmit,
  status: status
}
